title: art: A promise to the Pale Lady
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:old-money-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dia-de-muertos]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
This is a composition based on [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6755 SCP-6755] aka "A Promise to the Pale Lady" by [[*user Kilerpoyo]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image pale_lady.jpg width="550em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
La Fundación intentó
contender a la misma Muerte
a tiempo reconoció su error
pa' sortear una triste suerte.[[footnote]]The Foundation tried / to contain Death herself / in time they realized the error / to avoid a sorrowful fate.[[/footnote]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
